name: Easy JS and CSS support.

sections.description: This plugin enables you to insert javascript and css for a specific post or page. Files can be included or the code can be inserted inline in the <head>-tag.
sections.installation:
1. Fetch file and unpack to directory /wp-content/plugins/
  2. Activate plugin
  3. Insert Javascript and CSS in the post or page advanced options
sections.faq:
It does not work – there’s no output?

Be sure to output wp_head in your template by inserting <?php wp_head(); ?>
sections.changelog:
1.3

  • First stable upload

1.4

  • Bugfix: fields got remove on comment update.
  • Meta-fields are now prefixed with _ to make them hidden.

short_description: Adds the options to insert page/post specific javascript and css.
description: This plugin enables you to insert javascript and css for a specific post or page. Files can be included or the code can be inserted inline in the <head>-tag.
